prompt: Create a colorful profile page with vibrant purple gradient background. Position large circular profile picture (140px) at top with white border and soft shadow. Display user's name in bold white text and email in lighter shade below. Include bio section with sample text in rounded container with semi-transparent white background. Add two rows of action buttons: first row with Edit and Settings buttons, second row with Logout button centered. Use complementary colors for buttons with proper spacing and rounded corners throughout design.
